welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ollerton, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom! Known for its beautiful countryside and rich history, we invite you to relax and explore all that our town has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For private and charter flights, the private terminal offers a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, free for the first 4 hours.
